_sText:
Map works fine on old machines as-well. All you need to do is to put it in your cstrike/maps/ folder, and add it to your map cycle.
Features:

1. Soccer
2. Big Gun Toss / LR Zone.
3. Pool
4. Team Activator checker for the weapons door
5. 2 Escaping cells
6. One weapon (Glock-18) cell with 30~ bullets.
7. 'red cell', you can get to it through the soccer (hidden area).

I'm working on ba jail minecraft a2 right now, the next version will be much better, inclouding: Race, Better LR zone (shot 4 shot, etc.) and more activity zones.

== extremely important ==
You need to install textures from this link: http://www.sendspace.com/file/nfjyj5
in order to actually see the map as it is. Extract the .rar in cstrike/meterials.
